dcterms:creator: Bilal M
Kather JN
Heij LR
dcterms:description: The TCGA-CRC-DX dataset is a multicentric collection of tissue specimens, which includes tumors of all stages in the TCGA-COAD and TCGA-READ datasets. It has been used in multiple studies for predicting microsatellite instability.
dcterms:title: TCGA-CRC-DX

dcterms:creator: A. Echle
N. G. Laleh
P. Quirke
dcterms:description: The MCO dataset is a collection of any stage patients who underwent curative resection for colorectal cancer between 1994 and 2010 in New South Wales, Australia. It includes 1,065 WSIs from 1,065 patients with ground truth labels for various biomarkers.
dcterms:title: MCO

dcterms:creator: Kather JN
Grabsch HI
dcterms:description: The NCT-CRC-HE-100K dataset consists of nine types of CRC tissue images collected for deep learning applications. It includes 100,000 image tiles, which are used for training models to predict microsatellite instability directly from histology.
dcterms:title: NCT-CRC-HE-100K

dcterms:creator: Kather JN
Grabsch HI
dcterms:description: The CRC-VAL-HE-7K dataset contains CRC image tiles of nine tissue types and is used for validating deep learning models in predicting various biomarkers.
dcterms:title: CRC-VAL-HE-7K
